member.name: T:com.mosso.cloudfiles.Connection
member.summary: This class represents the primary means of interaction between a user and cloudfiles. Methods are provided representing all of the actions one can take against his/her account, such as creating containers and downloading storage objects.

example.code: UserCredentials userCredentials = new UserCredentials("username", "api key"); IConnection connection = new Connection(userCredentials);

member.summary: A constructor used to create an instance of the Connection class

example.code: UserCredentials userCredentials = new UserCredentials("username", "api key"); IConnection connection = new Connection(userCredentials);

member.param: An instance of the UserCredentials class, containing all pertinent authentication information
member.exception: Thrown when any of the reference parameters are null
